title: Game of Thrones S04E06 [CENSORED] - 720p

DISCLAIMER

Although I edited out all the nudity, there is still lots of swearing left, sexual references, and violence. Keep that in mind if you are thinking of showing this show to your children. This show was not made for children, and even without the nudity it is still a very adult show.
___________________________________________________________________________________

[------------------------------------Quick FAQ------------------------------------]
[----------------------------Please Read Before Posting---------------------------]

Q: Why would someone want this?
A: If they did not watch the series since they didn't want to watch the nudity and sex or if they want to watch it with a friend or family member who does not want to watch the nudity and sex.

Q: Why did you do this?
A: I wanted to watch this show with some friends, but they heard about all the excessive sex and nudity, and didn't want any part of it. I decided to censor it for them, so they could enjoy the show like I have. Since I already did it, I thought I might as well upload it for other people to benefit.

Q: Wouldn't censoring this leave holes in the story?
A: Yes, that is why I have kept most of the scenes, even the ones with nudity mostly intact. If the scene has no story purposes, I just edit it out. If it is important to the story, I just crop out the nudity bits. So, you can still get all the action without the "action".

Q: How did you edit this/what did you use?
A: I first use XMedia Recode to remux the original MKV file to MP4. Then I edit it in Premiere Pro and export it to a large file size. Finally, I use Handbrake to compress it to a reasonable file size.

Q: Are there any subtitles for this/can you make some?
A: No, the program I use to edit these doesn't support subtitles at all. Sorry about that.

Q: Could you also remove the cussing?
A: I've considered this before, but most people want this to stay in, and I don't mind it so it's going to stay.

Q: Can you also edit (insert show)?
A: Sorry, I don't really take requests, but you can still ask, and if I ever watch that show I'll consider it.

Q: I think that this is a horrible thing to do, and you are a bad person for uploading this to the internet.
A: That isn't a question.	
___________________________________________________________________________________

Note: If I perhaps missed something you think I should of censored, comment explaining what I missed and I'll re-upload the episode if it's something I think should be censored.
